name: Cindy's Fashion World
overview: Cindy, Kate, and Diana are cool, stylish girls, and great friends. They decide to go shopping and have fun. As they are going to a party in the evening they have to look absolutely gorgeous. There are five games to play. You will get a chance to dress the girls in cool clothes, do their hair and makeup, go shopping, go to a cafe, and groom their cute pets. There is also four cool tests to play as you find out more about yourself and your friends. But this is not all! There are also eight pictures to colour according to your taste!
